text: The 2015–16 HC Slovan Bratislava season was the 4th season for Bratislava based club in Kontinental Hockey League. On July 2 it was officially announced that Slovan will continue playing in KHL, with Miloš Říha being appointed a head coach. Tomáš Surový was appointed a team Capitan with Ladislav Nagy and Michal Sersen as alternative captains.http://www.slovanpositive.com/s-pripravou-absolutna-spokojnost-na- lane-este-dvaja-hraci/ ==Schedule and results== ===Pre-season=== Pre-season schedule was announced on July 12, 2015.http://www.slovanpositive.com/pripravne-zapasy-hc-slovan/ {| class="toccolours" width=100% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; text- align:center;" |- !
